channel.title: RSCAngel - Biggest ever RSC Private server [700+ people online at peak times!]
channel.description:
[img]http://img200.imageshack.us/img200/5050/rsca3.png[/img] [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/axiu6u.png[/img] [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/23my5c.png[/img] xEnt likes penis'
RSCA has been around for over a year!
We are the longest running server. This is the least corrupt private server you will ever find.
The mods and admins are all mature adults and any abuse is dealt with swiftly. We're also the most populated and one of the most known RSC private servers.
RSCA was the first ever (rscd) server to have chest + stall thieving, pickpocketing and picklocking. We take a very hard stance on autoers and have banned over 3,000 autoers and abusers to date.
We update the server however updates tend to take more time than other servers, this is for three reasons. First we take a lot of time to test updates prior to adding them to make sure all or at least most of the bugs are caught and fixed, secondly a lot of our resources go into supporting players and thirdly we have real lives :>
For anyone who had tried us and quit because of the login server problems, I spent a while fixing them a couple of weeks back and since then it has pretty much been perfect apart from the couple of times we were DDoSed, then it was a bit harder to login.
We've got some nice updates to come, including quests and a brand new combat system which mirrors RSC's very closely.
[hr]
xEnt:
Ever wanted to play the good old f2p days again? I will be replicating the F2P version of RuneScape Classic as far as i can, right now almost all of the content is added except all quests (which will get added over time).
Server rates:
2x Normal 3x Subscriber
You may find more details on RSCAngel forums in the F2P part of the forums.
Report any bugs, they WILL get fixed fast, report any missing content that was there in F2P RSC. All P2P Features have been removed completely.
If you ever wanted to play RSCAngel but thought it was too late to become the best, now is your chance.
[hr]

item.title: RSCAngel - Biggest ever RSC Private server [700+ people online at peak times!]
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

I can see how some may want to use PunBB/FluxBB for it’s familiarity and ease of use but come on, there are many other forums out there like IPB and VB which are just as customizable and a heck of a lot more secure. We use a VB bridge so the owner column is replaced by the vb_id of their forum account and wrote our own player interface scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCAngel - Biggest ever RSC Private server [700+ people online at peak times!]
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:802, topic:243174”]Yup, woke up to find it hacked, not even bothered enough to find out how, so closing the server down. Not really much point trying to carry on at this point anyway. Annoying though because I had just personally paid for the server to be renewed for this month on the off chance that the projects I was working on went well.

Anyway, I’ll be releasing the RSCAngel source code soon and I shall leave this topic open for a few days to discuss the lulzyness of the hack/w\e[/quote]

RIP RSCA. Total respect for this server, staff, developers and players.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCAngel - Biggest ever RSC Private server [700+ people online at peak times!]
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:806, topic:243174”][quote author=KO9 link=topic=319491.msg3294271#msg3294271 date=1280842937]
Yup, woke up to find it hacked, not even bothered enough to find out how, so closing the server down. Not really much point trying to carry on at this point anyway. Annoying though because I had just personally paid for the server to be renewed for this month on the off chance that the projects I was working on went well.

Anyway, I’ll be releasing the RSCAngel source code soon and I shall leave this topic open for a few days to discuss the lulzyness of the hack/w\e
[/quote]

Aaaw fuck pets the site was your work right? (lol @ this)

Fun to see you releasing the source will be so nice to leech it.

Anyways its very sad R.I.P RSCAngel its been here longer then me. Speciel (are you fucking serious?) ++ for you Ko9 For keeping it up for the time its been here.[/quote]

Made the appropriate corrections.

Read full topic
